exceptions.tactic: intros g f x H1 H2 H3.
intros g' f x H1 H2 H3.
intros g' f' x H1 H2 H3.
intros g' f' x' H1 H2 H3.

original: intros g f x H1 H2 H3. unfold Lim in H1, H2. unfold ex_lim in H1, H2. destruct H1 as [l1 H1]. destruct H2 as [l2 H2]. unfold Rbar_locally' in H3. destruct x. - unfold is_lim in H1, H2. unfold Rbar_locally in H3. destruct H3 as [eps H3]. apply is_lim_unique with (f:=fun x => f (g x)); auto. apply is_lim_comp with (l:=l1) (k:=l2); auto. intros y Hy. apply H3. apply Rbar_lt_locally; try apply Rbar_lt_locally; auto. - destruct H3 as [M H3]. destruct (H2 eps) as [N H2']. exists (N M). intros n. destruct (H1 (N M) n) as [N' H1']. destruct (H2' n) as [M' H2'']. specialize (H1' H2''). specialize (H3 n). apply is_Rbar_mult with (y:=M) in H1'. apply Rle_lt_trans with (r2:=N' * M) in H1'; auto. apply Rle_lt_trans with (r2:=N * M) in H1'; auto. apply Rlt_le_trans with (r3:= (N * M')%R) in H1'; auto. apply Rmult_lt_compat_r; auto. apply Rlt_trans with (r2:=M') in H3; auto. - destruct H3 as [M H3]. destruct (H1 eps) as [N H1']. destruct (H2 M) as [N' H2']. exists (Rmax N N'). intros y Hy. specialize (H1 y). specialize (H2' (g y)). split. + apply H1. apply Rle_lt_trans with (r2:=N) in Hy; auto. + apply H2'. apply Rnot_le_lt. intros Contra. apply Hy. apply Rlt_le_trans with (r2:=N') in Hy; auto.
